function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate detection limit and precision of quantitative data","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of virus detectability and infection rates","Mitigation":"Conducting additional experiments and improving parameterization of important phenomena","Technologies":"Digital PCR for increasing precision","People":"Researchers, public health authorities","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Logistical challenges and costs of WBE approach","Impact":"Inability to effectively retest population for new and repeated infections","Mitigation":"Investing in technological advancements to reduce costs and streamline logistics","Technologies":"Automation, data analytics, sensor technology","People":"Wastewater treatment plant operators, public health agencies","Owner":"Government agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Limited access to WBE for certain regions and populations","Impact":"Inequality in health monitoring and virus detection","Mitigation":"Making strategic investments in WBE infrastructure and expanding accessibility","Technologies":"Infrastructure development, remote sensing technology","People":"Underprivileged communities, developing countries","Owner":"Government agencies, international organizations"}]}
